verses.verse: These are the sons<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> Reuben,<WH7205> Simeon,<WH8095> Levi,<WH3878> and Judah,<WH3063> Issachar,<WH3485> and Zebulun,<WH2074>
Dan,<WH1835> Joseph,<WH3130> and Benjamin,<WH1144> Naphtali,<WH5321> Gad,<WH1410> and Asher.<WH836>

The sons<WH1121> of Judah:<WH3063> Er,<WH6147> and Onan,<WH209> and Shelah;<WH7956> which three<WH7969> were born<WH3205> to him of Shua<WH7774>'s daughter<WH1323> the Canaanitess.<WH3669> Er,<WH6147> Judah<WH3063>'s firstborn,<WH1060> was wicked<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh;<WH3068> and he killed him.<WH4191>
Tamar<WH8559> his daughter-in<WH3618>-law bore<WH3205> him Perez<WH6557> and Zerah.<WH2226> All the sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> were five.<WH2568>
The sons<WH1121> of Perez:<WH6557> Hezron,<WH2696> and Hamul.<WH2538>
The sons<WH1121> of Zerah:<WH2226> Zimri,<WH2174> and Ethan,<WH387> and Heman,<WH1968> and Calcol,<WH3633> and Dara;<WH1873> five of them in all.<WH2568>
The sons<WH1121> of Carmi:<WH3756> Achar,<WH5917> the troubler<WH5916> of Israel,<WH3478> who committed a trespass<WH4603> in the devoted thing.<WH2764>
The sons<WH1121> of Ethan:<WH387> Azariah.<WH5838>
The sons<WH1121> also of Hezron,<WH2696> who were born<WH3205> to him:<WH3396> Jerahmeel, and Ram,<WH7410> and Chelubai.<WH3621>
Ram<WH7410> became the father<WH3205> of Amminadab,<WH5992> and Amminadab<WH5992> became the father<WH3205> of Nahshon,<WH5177> prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Judah;<WH3063>
and Nahshon<WH5177> became the father<WH3205> of Salma,<WH8007> and Salma<WH8007> became the father<WH3205> of Boaz,<WH1162>
and Boaz<WH1162> became the father<WH3205> of Obed,<WH5744> and Obed<WH5744> became the father<WH3205> of Jesse;<WH3448>
and Jesse<WH3448> became the father<WH3205> of his firstborn<WH1060> Eliab,<WH446> and Abinadab<WH41> the second,<WH8145> and Shimea<WH8092> the third,<WH7992>
Nethanel<WH5417> the fourth,<WH7243> Raddai<WH7288> the fifth,<WH2549>
Ozem<WH684> the sixth,<WH8345> David<WH1732> the seventh;<WH7637>
and their sisters<WH269> were Zeruiah<WH6870> and Abigail.<WH26> The sons<WH1121> of Zeruiah:<WH6870> Abishai,<WH52> and Joab,<WH3097> and Asahel,<WH6214> three.<WH7969>
Abigail<WH26> bore<WH3205> Amasa;<WH6021> and the father<WH1> of Amasa<WH6021> was Jether<WH3500> the Ishmaelite.<WH3459>

Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Hezron<WH2696> became the father<WH3205> of<WH854> children of Azubah<WH5806> his wife,<WH802> and of Jerioth;<WH3408> and these were her sons:<WH1121> Jesher,<WH3475> and Shobab,<WH7727> and Ardon.<WH715>
Azubah<WH5806> died,<WH4191> and Caleb<WH3612> took<WH3947> to him Ephrath,<WH672> who bore<WH3205> him Hur.<WH2354>
Hur<WH2354> became the father<WH3205> of Uri,<WH221> and Uri<WH221> became the father<WH3205> of Bezalel.<WH1212>

Afterward<WH310> Hezron<WH2696> went in<WH935> to the daughter<WH1323> of Machir<WH4353> the father<WH1> of Gilead,<WH1568> whom he took as wife<WH3947> when he was sixty<WH8346> years<WH8141> old;<WH1121> and she bore<WH3205> him Segub.<WH7687>
Segub<WH7687> became the father<WH3205> of Jair,<WH2971> who had twenty<WH5892> - three cities in the land<WH776> of Gilead.<WH1568>

Geshur<WH1650> and Aram<WH758> took<WH3947> the towns<WH2333> of Jair<WH2971> from them,<WH7079> with Kenath, and its villages,<WH2333> even sixty<WH8346> cities.<WH5892> All these were the sons<WH1121> of Machir<WH4353> the father<WH1> of Gilead.<WH1568>
After<WH310> that Hezron<WH2696> was dead<WH4194> in Caleb Ephrathah,<WH3613> then Abijah<WH29> Hezron<WH2696>'s wife<WH802> bore<WH3205> him Ashhur<WH806> the father<WH1> of Tekoa.<WH8620>
The sons<WH1121> of Jerahmeel<WH3396> the firstborn<WH1060> of Hezron<WH2696> were Ram<WH7410> the firstborn,<WH1060> and Bunah,<WH946> and Oren,<WH767> and Ozem,<WH684> Ahijah.<WH281>
Jerahmeel<WH3396> had another<WH312> wife,<WH802> whose name<WH8034> was Atarah;<WH5851> she was the mother<WH517> of Onam.<WH208>
The sons<WH1121> of Ram<WH7410> the firstborn<WH1060> of Jerahmeel<WH3396> were Maaz,<WH4619> and Jamin,<WH3226> and Eker.<WH6134>
The sons<WH1121> of Onam<WH208> were Shammai,<WH8060> and Jada.<WH3047> The sons<WH1121> of Shammai:<WH8060> Nadab,<WH5070> and Abishur.<WH51>
The name<WH8034> of the wife<WH802> of Abishur<WH51> was Abihail;<WH32> and she bore<WH3205> him Ahban,<WH257> and Molid.<WH4140>
The sons<WH1121> of Nadab:<WH5070> Seled,<WH5540> and Appaim;<WH649> but Seled<WH5540> died<WH4191> without children.<WH1121>
The sons<WH1121> of Appaim:<WH649> Ishi.<WH3469> The sons<WH1121> of Ishi:<WH3469> Sheshan.<WH8348> The sons<WH1121> of Sheshan:<WH8348> Ahlai.<WH304>
The sons<WH1121> of Jada<WH3047> the brother<WH251> of Shammai:<WH8060> Jether,<WH3500> and Jonathan;<WH3129> and Jether<WH3500> died<WH4191> without children.<WH1121>
The sons<WH1121> of Jonathan:<WH3129> Peleth,<WH6431> and Zaza.<WH2117> These were the sons<WH1121> of Jerahmeel.<WH3396>
Now Sheshan<WH8348> had no sons,<WH1121> but daughters.<WH1323> Sheshan<WH8348> had a servant,<WH5650> an Egyptian,<WH4713> whose name<WH8034> was Jarha.<WH3398>
Sheshan<WH8348> gave<WH5414> his daughter<WH1323> to Jarha<WH3398> his servant<WH5650> as wife;<WH802> and she bore<WH3205> him Attai.<WH6262>
Attai<WH6262> became the father<WH3205> of Nathan,<WH5416> and Nathan<WH5416> became the father<WH3205> of Zabad,<WH2066>
and Zabad<WH2066> became the father<WH3205> of Ephlal,<WH654> and Ephlal<WH654> became the father<WH3205> of Obed,<WH5744>
and Obed<WH5744> became the father<WH3205> of Jehu,<WH3058> and Jehu<WH3058> became the father<WH3205> of Azariah,<WH5838>
and Azariah<WH5838> became the father<WH3205> of Helez,<WH2503> and Helez<WH2503> became the father<WH3205> of Eleasah,<WH501>
and Eleasah<WH501> became the father<WH3205> of Sismai,<WH5581> and Sismai<WH5581> became the father<WH3205> of Shallum,<WH7967>
and Shallum<WH7967> became the father<WH3205> of Jekamiah,<WH3359> and Jekamiah<WH3359> became the father<WH3205> of Elishama.<WH476>

The sons<WH1121> of Caleb<WH3612> the brother<WH251> of Jerahmeel<WH3396> were Mesha<WH4337> his firstborn,<WH1060> who was the father<WH1> of Ziph;<WH2128> and the sons<WH1121> of Mareshah<WH4762> the father<WH1> of Hebron.<WH2275>
The sons<WH1121> of Hebron:<WH2275> Korah,<WH7141> and Tappuah,<WH8599> and Rekem,<WH7552> and Shema.<WH8087>
Shema<WH8087> became the father<WH3205> of Raham,<WH7357> the father<WH3205> of Jorkeam;<WH3421> and Rekem<WH7552> became the father<WH3205> of Shammai.<WH8060>
The son<WH1121> of Shammai<WH8060> was Maon;<WH4584> and Maon<WH4584> was the father<WH1> of Beth Zur.<WH1049>
Ephah,<WH5891> Caleb<WH3612>'s concubine,<WH6370> bore<WH3205> Haran,<WH2771> and Moza,<WH4162> and Gazez;<WH1495> and Haran<WH2771> became the father<WH3205> of Gazez.<WH1495>
The sons<WH1121> of Jahdai:<WH3056> Regem,<WH7276> and Jothan,<WH3147> and Geshan,<WH1529> and Pelet,<WH6404> and Ephah,<WH5891> and Shaaph.<WH8174>
Maacah,<WH4601> Caleb<WH3612>'s concubine,<WH6370> bore<WH3205> Sheber<WH7669> and Tirhanah.<WH8647>

She bore<WH3205> also Shaaph<WH8174> the father<WH1> of Madmannah,<WH4089> Sheva<WH7724> the father<WH1> of Machbena,<WH4343> and the father<WH1> of Gibea;<WH1388> and the daughter<WH1323> of Caleb<WH3612> was Achsah.<WH5915>
These were the sons<WH1121> of Caleb,<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Hur,<WH2354> the firstborn<WH1060> of Ephrathah:<WH672> Shobal<WH7732> the father<WH1> of Kiriath Jearim,<WH7157>
Salma<WH8007> the father<WH1> of Bethlehem,<WH1035> Hareph<WH2780> the father<WH1> of Beth Gader.<WH1013>
Shobal<WH7732> the father<WH1> of Kiriath Jearim<WH7157> had sons:<WH1121> Haroeh,<WH7204> half<WH2677> of the Menuhoth.<WH2679>

The families<WH4940> of Kiriath Jearim:<WH7157> The Ithrites,<WH3505> and the Puthites,<WH6336> and the Shumathites,<WH8126> and the Mishraites;<WH4954> of them came<WH3318> the Zorathites<WH6882> and the Eshtaolites.<WH848>
The sons<WH1121> of Salma:<WH8007> Bethlehem,<WH1035> and the Netophathites,<WH5200> Atroth<WH5852> Beth Joab,<WH5854> and half<WH2677> of the Manahathites,<WH2680> the Zorites.<WH6882>

The families<WH4940> of scribes<WH5608> who lived<WH3427> at Jabez:<WH3258> the Tirathites,<WH8654> the Shimeathites,<WH8101> the Sucathites.<WH7756> These<WH1992> are the Kenites<WH7017> who came<WH935> of Hammath,<WH2574> the father<WH1> of the house<WH1004> of Rechab.<WH7394>
